abstract context default macro globals ignorepat switch if ifTime else random goto jump return break continue regexten hint for while case pattern catch switches eswitches includes #include
Authenticate Bridge ChannelRedirect ClearHash Keepalive Log Page PickupChannel SendDTMF SendImage SendText SendURL System Transfer VMAutenticate Wait WaitExten WaitForRing
AppendCDRUserField ForkCDR NoCDR ResetCDR SetAMAFlags
AMA Answer Busy ChanIsAvail Congestion Dial DISA Hangup Originate RetryDial RetryDial RetryDial Ringing
CallingPresChange the presentation for the callerid1.01.01.2 LookupBlacklistLook up Caller*ID name/number from blacklist database.1.01.41.6Deprecated in favor of BLACKLIST LookupCIDNameLook up CallerID Name from local database.1.01.41.6Deprecated in favor of ${DB(cidname/${CALLERID(num)})}. PrivacyManagerRequire phone number to be entered, if no CallerID sent.1.0) SetCallerIDSet CallerID. Deprecated in favor of CALLERID.1.01.41.6 SetCallerPresChannel independent setting of caller presenation.1.01.6Deprecated in favor of function CALLERPRES SetCIDNameSet CallerID Name.1.01.41.6Deprecated in favor of function CALLERID. SetCIDNumSet only the Caller ID number (not name).1.01.41.6 Deprecated in favor of CALLERID. SoftHangupRequest hangup on another channel.1.0 ZapatellerBlock telemarketers with SIT.1.0>
ADSIProgLoad Asterisk ADSI Scripts into phone1.0 GetCPEIDGet ADSI CPE ID1.0
DBdelDelete a key from the database.1.01.41.6Deprecated in favor of function DB_DELETE. DBdeltreeDelete a family or keytree from the database.1.0 DBgetRetrieve a value from the database.1.01.41.6 Deprecated in favor of DB. DBputStore a value in the database.1.01.41.6 Deprecated in favor of DB. RealTimePopulate variables with details from database using RealTime.1.01.41.6Deprecated in favor of REALTIME. RealTimeUpdateUpdate a field in a database using RealTime.1.01.41.6Deprecated in favor of REALTIME.
AGIExecutes an AGI compliant application.1.0 DeadAGIExecutes AGI on a hung-up channel.1.0 EAGIExecutes an AGI compliant application with sound channels.1.0 EnumLookupLookup number in ENUM.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of function ENUMLOOKUP. ExternalIVRExecutes an ExternalIVR generator.1.2 JabberJoinJoin a group chat.1.8 JabberLeaveLeave a group chat.1.8 JabberSendSend a text message via Jabber.1.4 JabberSendGroupSend a message to a group chat.1.8 JabberStatusReturn presence status of client or transport as values 1-7.1.4 JackInterface to JACK audio for audio manipulation.1.6 ReadRead DTMF tones into a variable.1.0 ReadFileRead the contents of a text file into a channel variable.1.2 TXTCIDNameLookup caller name from TXT record.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of function TXTCIDNAME. UserEventSend an arbitrary event to the manager interface.1.0
AbsoluteTimeoutSet absolute maximum time of call.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of function TIMEOUT(absolute) ContinueWhileRestart a while loop1.4 DigitTimeoutSet maximum timeout between digits.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of TIMEOUT(digit) EndWhileEnd A While Loop.1.2 ExecExecute dialplan application.1.0 ExecIfConditional exec.1.2 ExecIfTimeExecutes dialplan application conditionally based on current time.1.2 ExitWhileEnd a While loop.1.2 GosubJump to a subroutine and return.1.2 GosubIfConditional jump to a subroutine and return.1.2 GotoGoto a particular priority, extension, or context.1.0 GotoIfConditional goto.1.0 GotoIfTimeConditional goto on current time.1.0 MacroMacro Implementation.1.01.6Deprecated in favor of Gosub/Return. MacroExclusiveOnly one channel at a time may call this macro, all others have to wait1.41.6Replaced by dialplan functions LOCK(), TRYLOCK(), and UNLOCK() MacroExitExit the macro as if it had fully completed.1.41.6Deprecated in favor of Return MacroIfConditional Macro Implementation.1.01.6Deprecated in favor of GosubIf NoOpNo operation. For debugging, see Verbose or Log.1.0 Randomjump to a specified location based on a random probability.1.01.41.6Deprecated in favor of GotoIf($[${RAND(1,100)} > number]?label) ResponseTimeoutSet maximum timeout awaiting response.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of function TIMEOUT(response) ReturnReturn from a Gosub or GosubIf.1.2 StackPopRemove a return address without returning.1.2 WhileStart A While Loop.1.2
CutSplit a string on a specified delimiter.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of function CUT. DumpChanDump Info About The Calling Channel.1.2 ImportVarSet variable to value.1.2 MathPerform (rather simple) calculations.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of MATH. MSetSet channel variable(s) or function value(s)1.6 SetGlobalVarSet variable to value.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of Asterisk func global. SetSet channel variable(s) or function value(s).1.0
BackgroundPlay a sound file while waiting an extension.1.0 BackgroundDetectBackground a file with talk detect.1.0 ControlPlaybackPlay a sound file with fast forward, rewind and exit controls.1.0 DateTimeSay the date and/or time. Same as SayUnixTime.1.0 EchoEcho audio read back to the user.1.0 FestivalSay text with the Festival voice synthesizer.1.0 MilliwattGenerate a Constant 1000Hz tone at 0dbm (mu-law).1.0 MP3PlayerPlay an MP3 sound file or stream.1.0 MusicOnHoldPlay Music On Hold indefinitely.1.0 PlaybackPlay a sound file.1.0 PlaytonesPlay a tone list while executing other commands.1.0 ProceedingIndicate proceeding1.6 ProgressPlay early audio to the caller before answering the line.1.0 SayUnixTimeSay the date and/or time.1.0 SayAlphaSay Alpha.1.0 Asterisk cmd SayCountedAdjSay declining counting phrases1.8 Asterisk cmd SayCountedNounSay declining counting phrases1.8 SayDigitsSay Digits.1.0 SayNumberSay Number.1.0 SayPhoneticSay Phonetic.1.0 SetMusicOnHoldSet default Music On Hold class.1.01.6Deprecated in favor of function CHANNEL(musicclass) SetLanguageChange language setting for sound playback.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of function LANGUAGE. StopPlaytonesStop playing a tone list.1.0
ChangeMonitorChange monitoring filename of a channel.1.0 ChanSpyUniversal channel barge-in.1.2 DictateRecords and plays back a dictation.1.2 ExtenSpyListen/whisper to a specific extension.1.4 MixMonitorRecord and mix call legs natively (unlike Monitor).1.2 MonitorRecord a telephone conversation to a sound file.1.0 RecordRecord user voice input to a file.1.0 StopMonitorStop monitoring a channel.1.0 StopMixMonitorStop monitoring a channel monitored with MixMonitor.1.4
SIPAddHeaderAdd header to outbound SIP invite.1.2 SIPdtmfModeChange DTMF mode during SIP call.1.0 SIPGetHeaderGet a SIP header from an incoming call.1.01.21.4Deprecated in favor of function SIP_HEADER().
